{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Samsung |model=ET-WV520 |revision=B(WEGUS) |asin=B06XSCSBPJ,B06XSDFMND |price=170 |series=AC1300 |fcc_date=03/06/2017 |manuf_country=Vietnam |is_manuf=No |type=wireless router, wireless system, IoT hub, |fcc_id=A3LETWV520 |ic_id=649E-ETWV520 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2.1 |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model=IPQ4019 |cpu1_cspeed=717 |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=4 GiB |fla1_brand=Samsung |fla1_model=KLM4G1FEPD |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4B4G1646E-BYK0 |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm |wi1_chip1_model=IPQ4019 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm |wi2_chip1_model=IPQ4019 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8072 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=Bluetooth 4.1 Radio;CSR;CSR8811;;1; ,,, Zigbee Radio Controller;Silicon Labs;EFR32;;1; ,,, Serial Interface Modem SoC;Sigma Designs;SD3503;;1; |flags=Wave2, MU-MIMO, Bluetooth LE, ZigBee, Z-Wave, DFS (master), |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac }}
:• '''867''' Mbps - 2SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''400''' Mbps - 2SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan., 256QAM) = '''''1300 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|Connect Home AC1300 Smart Wi-Fi System}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.samsung.com/us/smart-home/smartthings/hubs/samsung-connect-home-smart-wi-fi-system---single-et-wv520bwegus/}} {{SupportPage|http://www.samsung.com/us/support/owners/product/connect-home-single}} Sold as a single device labeled as a ET-WV520'''B''' :or as a 3-pack kit as the ET-WV520'''K''' Some reviews online say that the device contains :512MiB of RAM and 4GiB of flash. {{WiFiCert|WFA69919|02/02/2017}} ===Teardown=== *[https://www.ifixit.com/Teardown/Samsung+Connect+Home+Teardown/104807 ''Samsung Connect Home'' Teardown on '''iFixit'''] ===See also=== :[[List of Wireless Systems]] *[[Samsung ET-WV520]] - ''Connect Home Smart Wi-Fi System'' *[[Samsung ET-WV525]] - ''SmartTings WiFi Hub'' *[[Samsung ET-WV530]] - ''Connect Home Pro Smart Wi-Fi System'' *[[Samsung ET-WV535]] - ''SmartTings WiFi Pro Hub'' __NOTOC__
